00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 
00031 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00032   * @{
00033   */
00034 
00035 /** @addtogroup FMC_Examples FMC
00036   * @{
00037   */
00038 
00039 /** @addtogroup FLASH_Program
00040   * @{
00041   */
00042 
00043 
00044 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00045 #define StartAddress    (1024 * 4)
00046 #define EndAddress      (1024 * 8)
00047 
00048 #define TEST_DATA       (0x12345678)
00049 
00050 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00051 void FLASH_Erase(void);
00052 void FLASH_Program(void);
00053 void FLASH_Check(void);
00054 
00055 /* Global variables ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00056 u32 err;
00057 
00058 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00059 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00060   * @brief  Main program.
00061   * @retval None
00062   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00063 int main(void)
00064 {
00065   /* Erase Flash pages before program data                                                                  */
00066   FLASH_Erase();
00067   /* Program Word data                                                                                      */
00068   FLASH_Program();
00069   /* Check Flash data                                                                                       */
00070   FLASH_Check();
00071   if (err != 0)
00072   {
00073     while (1); /* Test Failed                                                                               */
00074   }
00075 
00076   while (1); /* Test Passed                                                                                 */
00077 }
00078 
00079 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00080   * @brief Erase FLASH Byte page.
00081   * @retval None
00082  ************************************************************************************************************/
00083 void FLASH_Erase(void)
00084 {
00085   u32 Addr;
00086   FLASH_State FLASHState;
00087   for (Addr = StartAddress; Addr < EndAddress; Addr += FLASH_PAGE_SIZE)
00088   {
00089     FLASHState = FLASH_ErasePage(Addr);
00090     if (FLASHState != FLASH_COMPLETE)
00091     {
00092       err++;
00093     }
00094   }
00095 }
00096 
00097 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00098   * @brief Program FLASH Byte page.
00099   * @retval None
00100  ************************************************************************************************************/
00101 void FLASH_Program(void)
00102 {
00103   u32 Addr;
00104   FLASH_State FLASHState;
00105   for (Addr = StartAddress; Addr < EndAddress; Addr += 4)
00106   {
00107     FLASHState = FLASH_ProgramWordData(Addr, TEST_DATA);
00108     if (FLASHState != FLASH_COMPLETE)
00109     {
00110       err++;
00111     }
00112   }
00113 }
00114 
00115 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00116   * @brief Check FLASH Byte page.
00117   * @retval None
00118  ************************************************************************************************************/
00119 void FLASH_Check(void)
00120 {
00121   u32 Addr;
00122 
00123   for (Addr = StartAddress; Addr < EndAddress; Addr += 4)
00124   {
00125     if (rw(Addr) != TEST_DATA)
00126     {
00127       err++;
00128     }
00129   }
00130 }
00131 
00132 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)

00135   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00136   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00137   * @retval None
00138   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00139 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00140 {
00141   /*
00142      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00143      Debug message can be added here.
00144      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00145   */
00146 
00147   while (1)
00148   {
00149   }
00150 }
00151 #endif
